Title: The Problem of Right and Wrong ï½œ Tao Te Ching Explained Chapter 38 Part 2
Content: Focus on the essence of teachings rather than the superficial observance of rituals. Embrace a balanced approach to virtues like kindness and justice, recognizing their limitations and the importance of following the Tao.
